attributes.action: car insurance were getting ripped off
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the cost of car insurance is like the cost of petrol in this country it just keeps going up i am personaly outraged at the cost of insuring my car i am 20yrs old and own a suzuki wagon r and i have been quoted in excess of £1300 but if i drive i need it yeah of course its the right thing to do but is it worth it no caught without insurance they crush your car and give you a fine but if you only pay £200 for the car and £300 in fines you dont need to know maths to figure out your better off without it. IT NEEDS SORTED a drop in charges would be good but what ever you do dont charge us anymore motorist's pockets nearly empty we are asking for help to fill them up Thanks

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
